title: Morocco Records First Mpox Case In Marrakesh Since WHO Emergency Alert
content: Morocco has recorded a case of mpox in the tourist city of Marrakesh, the first in north Africa since the WHO declared an international emergency last month, the Africa CDC said.
summary: Morocco has recorded a case of mpox in the tourist city of Marrakesh, the first in north Africa since the WHO declared an international emergency last month, the Africa CDC said.

title: Nearly 250,000 Displaced In Myanmar After Typhoon Yagi Floods: Report
content: Floods in Myanmar sparked by Typhoon Yagi have displaced more than 235,000 people and killed at least 33, the junta said on Friday.
summary: Floods in Myanmar sparked by Typhoon Yagi have displaced more than 235,000 people and killed at least 33, the junta said on Friday.

title: "Life Is Not  Khata-Khat ...": S Jaishankar's Swipe At Rahul Gandhi
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar while addressing the Indian diaspora in Geneva said that life is not "khata-khat" (an easy job), it requires hard work.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar while addressing the Indian diaspora in Geneva said that life is not "khata-khat" (an easy job), it requires hard work.

title: Donald Trump: Age, Family, Net Worth, Political Career And More

title: UK To Restrict Junk Food Ads To Tackle High Childhood Obesity Levels
content: The UK will ban junk food advertising on the internet and daytime TV in a bid to tackle childhood obesity, sparking criticism on the political right over "nanny state" meddling.
summary: The UK will ban junk food advertising on the internet and daytime TV in a bid to tackle childhood obesity, sparking criticism on the political right over "nanny state" meddling.

title: Chicago Restaurant Offers The Most Expensive Martini In US, Priced At...
content: Adalina, an Italian restaurant in Chicago led by Top Chef alum Soo Ahn, has launched a "Marrow Martini," considered one of the most expensive cocktails in the US Priced at several thousand dollars.
summary: Adalina, an Italian restaurant in Chicago led by Top Chef alum Soo Ahn, has launched a "Marrow Martini," considered one of the most expensive cocktails in the US Priced at several thousand dollars.

title: "Discovered My Father Was On Flight": S Jaishankar Recalls 1984 Hijack
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Friday revealed that his father was on a hijacked flight in 1984 and said he had a unique window on "both sides" in such situations - the perspective of family members and those in the government.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Friday revealed that his father was on a hijacked flight in 1984 and said he had a unique window on "both sides" in such situations - the perspective of family members and those in the government.

title: Pak-Origin Man Found Guilty Of Murdering Indian With Range Rover SUV In UK
content: A 25-year-old man of Pakistani heritage has been convicted of murdering an Indian restaurant manager with a stolen car while the victim was cycling back home in south-east England on Valentine's Day this year.
summary: A 25-year-old man of Pakistani heritage has been convicted of murdering an Indian restaurant manager with a stolen car while the victim was cycling back home in south-east England on Valentine's Day this year.

title: Osama Bin Laden's Son Hamza Alive, Leading Al Qaeda In Afghanistan: Report
content: The report warned that warning that "under his command, Al Qaeda is regrouping and preparing for future attacks on Western targets".
summary: The report warned that warning that "under his command, Al Qaeda is regrouping and preparing for future attacks on Western targets".

title: WHO Clears World's First Mpox Vaccine For Use In Some Areas
content: The World Health Organization (WHO) has announced the MVA-BN vaccine as the first vaccine against mpox to be added to its prequalification list.
summary: The World Health Organization (WHO) has announced the MVA-BN vaccine as the first vaccine against mpox to be added to its prequalification list.

title: Climate Change Sent Sub-Surface Tremors, Caused Landslide For 9 Days: Study
content: In September 2023, a 1.2 kilometre-high mountain peak in an East Greenland fjord - a narrow inlet of sea between two steep cliffs - collapsed, causing a tsunami about 200 metres tall.
summary: In September 2023, a 1.2 kilometre-high mountain peak in an East Greenland fjord - a narrow inlet of sea between two steep cliffs - collapsed, causing a tsunami about 200 metres tall.

title: Mysterious Global Seismic Signal Traced To Greenland Mega-Landslide: Study
content: A year after a bizarre seismic signal baffled scientists globally, researchers have finally pinpointed its origin. The signal, classified as an "unidentified seismic object", was traced back to a colossal landslide in Greenland's remote Dickson Fjord
summary: A year after a bizarre seismic signal baffled scientists globally, researchers have finally pinpointed its origin. The signal, classified as an "unidentified seismic object", was traced back to a colossal landslide in Greenland's remote Dickson Fjord

title: Lizard, Car Tire, And Rs 50 Crore Watch: Hotels Reveal Bizarre Lost Items
content: Hotels.com's annual Hotel Room Insights Report reveals common and bizarre items left behind in hotel rooms, such as phone chargers and a $6 million watch. Some guests have also made unusual room service requests, like Evian-filled tubs and caviar hot
summary: Hotels.com's annual Hotel Room Insights Report reveals common and bizarre items left behind in hotel rooms, such as phone chargers and a $6 million watch. Some guests have also made unusual room service requests, like Evian-filled tubs and caviar hot

title: Opinion: Trump Keeps Forgetting He Isn't Contesting Biden Anymore
content: No question, Harris got the debate she would have wanted in her dreams. Trump was either poorly prepared or, more likely, not prepared at all.
summary: No question, Harris got the debate she would have wanted in her dreams. Trump was either poorly prepared or, more likely, not prepared at all.

title: Can Social Media Ban For Children Like Australia's Work? Evidence Suggests
content: Banning children under 16 from social media sounds like a seductive idea. For overwhelmed parents navigating their kids' lives in a digital age, this move from the Australian government may seem like a welcome relief.
summary: Banning children under 16 from social media sounds like a seductive idea. For overwhelmed parents navigating their kids' lives in a digital age, this move from the Australian government may seem like a welcome relief.

title: New Species Emerged As Tectonic Plates Shifted: Surprise Discovery
content: Coelacanths are deep-sea fish that live off the coasts of southern Africa and Indonesia and can reach up to two metres in length. For a long time, scientists believed they were extinct.
summary: Coelacanths are deep-sea fish that live off the coasts of southern Africa and Indonesia and can reach up to two metres in length. For a long time, scientists believed they were extinct.

title: As Storm Bebinca Approaches, Taiwan Uses AI To Predict Typhoon Paths
content: AI-generated forecasts, some powered by software from tech giants including Nvidia, whose chips are made by Taiwan's homegrown semiconductor champion TSMC, have so far outperformed traditional methods in predicting typhoon tracks.
summary: AI-generated forecasts, some powered by software from tech giants including Nvidia, whose chips are made by Taiwan's homegrown semiconductor champion TSMC, have so far outperformed traditional methods in predicting typhoon tracks.

title: US Teacher Used Students As "Lookouts" While She Had Sex With Teen
content: Hailey Clifton-Carmack was charged with child molestation, statutory rape, and endangering the welfare of a child, in addition to sexual contact with a student. However, these charges were dropped as part of the plea deal.
summary: Hailey Clifton-Carmack was charged with child molestation, statutory rape, and endangering the welfare of a child, in addition to sexual contact with a student. However, these charges were dropped as part of the plea deal.

title: New Research Aims To Decode Genetic Roots Of Mental Illness
content: Neurodevelopmental and psychiatric diseases (NPD), such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, autism, and depression, have a negative impact on individuals, families, and society. Unfortunately, effective therapies are often lacking.
summary: Neurodevelopmental and psychiatric diseases (NPD), such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, autism, and depression, have a negative impact on individuals, families, and society. Unfortunately, effective therapies are often lacking.

title: Sunita Williams To Address Earth From Orbiting Space Station Today
content: NASA astronauts Sunita 'Suni' Williams and Barry 'Butch' Wilmore will put a call to Earth and participate in a press conference aboard the International Space Station in low Earth orbit, the US space agency said.
summary: NASA astronauts Sunita 'Suni' Williams and Barry 'Butch' Wilmore will put a call to Earth and participate in a press conference aboard the International Space Station in low Earth orbit, the US space agency said.
